text: Mohammed Al-Shoraimi (, born 21 February 1995) is a Saudi Arabian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Pro League side Al-Raed . ==Career== Al-Shoraimi he started his career at the youth team of Al-Fara'a in Al-H̨arīq. On 3 July 2013, he joined the youth team of Al-Hilal. Al-Shoraimi left Al- Hilal and joined Pro League side Al-Raed on June 15, 2017. He renewed his contract with Al-Raed on July 14, 2019. On 8 October 2020, Al-Shoraimi was released by Al-Raed.
